string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: Make sure that your ads are clearly and fully visible to users
Initialize admob only once in your app
Don\'t self click your ads. To avoid harming advertisers and getting punished
Make sure that your ads aren\'t too close to clickable items to avoid Invalid traffic
Don\'t abuse user with too much ads. This will affect user experience and your earnings negatively
Users don\'t download ads that show an app! They need free app that may show some ads :)
Very high eCPM Floor has bad effect on Match Rate which leads to fewer impressions and lower earnings
Interstitial ads may generate more earning than Banner ads by up to 20%
Use interstitial ads wisely between activities, while loading or at app exit and don\'t flood user with them
Setup test device in admob before using your app that contain ads on your phone to avoid Invalid traffic
you can promote your apps, websites, or run ads that you\'ve directly negotiated with advertisers using Admob Campaigns.
